attributes.action: withdraw the troops from Iraq and Afghanistan and have them work with the Police to combat the violence and crime on the streets of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We can hardly be expected to police other countries when our crime levels are rising like a phoenix, and I don't mean state-issued statistics which are falsely optimistic, I mean the evidence which is reported everyday on the news and that which people see anywhere between sunset and sunrise. We must do this or soon the the streets will be anarchy with the violence being so bad even the police are being brutally attacked in broad daylight. If we don't do this then we may have almost an entire generation of anarchists

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
